Quote.Author: Felix Baumgartner
Quote.QuoteValue: As a little kid, I climbed a lot of trees because I always loved the bird's-eye view

Quote.Author: Felix Baumgartner
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm retired from the daredevil business

Quote.Author: Felix Dennis
Quote.QuoteValue: It's a long, slow sunset for ink-on-paper magazines, but sunsets can produce vast sums of money

Quote.Author: Felix Dennis
Quote.QuoteValue: I couldn't care less what anyone's 'perception' of me is. I'm too long in the tooth to care

Quote.Author: Felix Dennis
Quote.QuoteValue: The age of celebrity editors and monstrous staffing are over

Quote.Author: Felix Dennis
Quote.QuoteValue: Native trees are so important to our ecosystem

Quote.Author: Felix Dennis
Quote.QuoteValue: There are as many forms of happiness as sorrow, though most prove fleeting

Quote.Author: Felix Dennis
Quote.QuoteValue: I am absolutely convinced that my life was redeemed by poetry

Quote.Author: Felix Dennis
Quote.QuoteValue: You'll never get rich by working for your boss

Quote.Author: Felix Dennis
Quote.QuoteValue: There are far too many people in university in Britain. If you want to make money, be a plumber

Quote.Author: Felix Dennis
Quote.QuoteValue: People who get trapped in the tunnel vision of making money think that is all there is to life

Quote.Author: Felix Dennis
Quote.QuoteValue: The planet doesn't require saving, and actually hasn't asked Greenpeace to save it

Quote.Author: Felix Frankfurter
Quote.QuoteValue: It is a wise man who said that there is no greater inequality than the equal treatment of unequals

Quote.Author: Felix Frankfurter
Quote.QuoteValue: It must take account of what it decrees for today in order that today may not paralyze tomorrow

Quote.Author: Felix Frankfurter
Quote.QuoteValue: The mode by which the inevitable is reached is effort

Quote.Author: Felix Frankfurter
Quote.QuoteValue: Freedom of the press is not an end in itself but a means to the end of achieving a free society

Quote.Author: Felix Frankfurter
Quote.QuoteValue: Litigation is the pursuit of practical ends, not a game of chess

Quote.Author: Felix Frankfurter
Quote.QuoteValue: Old age and sickness bring out the essential characteristics of a man

Quote.Author: Felix Frankfurter
Quote.QuoteValue: The real rulers in Washington are invisible, and exercise power from behind the scenes

Quote.Author: Felix Frankfurter
Quote.QuoteValue: There can be no security where there is fear

Quote.Author: Felix Frankfurter
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't like a man to be too efficient. He's likely to be not human enough

Quote.Author: Felix Frankfurter
Quote.QuoteValue: Gratitude is one of the least articulate of the emotions, especially when it is deep

Quote.Author: Ferdinand Marcos
Quote.QuoteValue: Little boys have amazing minds

Quote.Author: Ferdinand Marcos
Quote.QuoteValue: The permissiveness of society must be balanced with authoritativeness

Quote.Author: Ferdinand Marcos
Quote.QuoteValue: The challenge to Asia is to discard the dry, meatless bone of mysticism and fatalism

Quote.Author: Ferdinand Marcos
Quote.QuoteValue: I often wonder what I will be remembered in history for. Scholar? Military hero? Builder?

Quote.Author: Ferdinand Marcos
Quote.QuoteValue: Nobody is impervious to misfortune

Quote.Author: Ferdinand Marcos
Quote.QuoteValue: Freedom is not just declared; it is exercised

Quote.Author: Ferdinand Marcos
Quote.QuoteValue: Once a champion, always a champion

Quote.Author: Ferdinand Marcos
Quote.QuoteValue: I was deposed by a coup d'etat, by friends that I trusted and aided by the American Government

Quote.Author: Ferdinand Marcos
Quote.QuoteValue: I can understand the Cultural Revolution of Mao Tse-tung

Quote.Author: Ferdinand Marcos
Quote.QuoteValue: What we ask of the developed countries is to let the Third World find a third way

Quote.Author: Fergie
Quote.QuoteValue: Wearing nice lingerie makes me feel really glamorous. I love to splurge on that

Quote.Author: Fergie
Quote.QuoteValue: I love diamond facials - they leave me glowing and refreshed

Quote.Author: Fergie
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm very close with my higher power. I have a very strong connection with it

Quote.Author: Fergie
Quote.QuoteValue: You know, I'm a curvy woman and I just want to be comfortable with that

Quote.Author: Fergie
Quote.QuoteValue: Dick Clark will be truly missed. We will carry on his legacy every New Year's Eve

Quote.Author: Fergie
Quote.QuoteValue: I have to wear two sports bras when I do my cardio. It takes a lot to hold these puppies up!

Quote.Author: Fergie
Quote.QuoteValue: I love crying at romantic movies like 'The Notebook.' I'm always bawling

Quote.Author: Fergie
Quote.QuoteValue: You'd be surprised how addicting high self-esteem is

Quote.Author: Fergie
Quote.QuoteValue: So many songs are just a wink to the audience, but people take them seriously. 'My Humps?' C'mon!

Quote.Author: Fergie
Quote.QuoteValue: I know this sounds generic, but I'm so happy to be home with my husband, my family, and my dog

Quote.Author: Fernando Flores
Quote.QuoteValue: Great work is done by people who are not afraid to be great

Quote.Author: Fernando Flores
Quote.QuoteValue: I made my own assessment of my life, and I began to live it. That was freedom

Quote.Author: Fernando Flores
Quote.QuoteValue: Our worst comes out when we behave like robots or professionals

Quote.Author: Fernando Flores
Quote.QuoteValue: Hope is the raw material of losers

Quote.Author: Fernando Flores
Quote.QuoteValue: I never blamed Pinochet, or my torturers, or external circumstances

Quote.Author: Fernando Flores
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to be able to risk your identity for a bigger future than the present you are living

Quote.Author: Fernando Flores
Quote.QuoteValue: When trust improves, the mood improves

Quote.Author: Fernando Flores
Quote.QuoteValue: Our best comes out when we have honest discussions

Quote.Author: Fernando Flores
Quote.QuoteValue: A feel-good style can be a symptom of unawareness or lack of caring

Quote.Author: Fernando Flores
Quote.QuoteValue: When I left prison, I had to figure out how to embrace my past

Quote.Author: Fetty Wap
Quote.QuoteValue: My whole thing is loyalty. Loyalty over royalty; word is bond

Quote.Author: Fetty Wap
Quote.QuoteValue: There's a lot of females that hustle, just like men hustle

Quote.Author: Fetty Wap
Quote.QuoteValue: Plans never go well for me. I just live every day like I ain't gonna live the next one

Quote.Author: Fetty Wap
Quote.QuoteValue: When I go to clubs, I don't have to wait outside

Quote.Author: Fetty Wap
Quote.QuoteValue: There's gonna be a lot of great songs, but there ain't going to be another 'Trap Queen.'

Quote.Author: Fetty Wap
Quote.QuoteValue: Gucci Mane is my favorite artist

Quote.Author: Fetty Wap
Quote.QuoteValue: If only the people around you know you're an artist, then you're doing something wrong

Quote.Author: Fetty Wap
Quote.QuoteValue: People don't really call me a rapper. They call me Mr. 'Trap Queen'. The 'Trap Queen' Guy

Quote.Author: Fetty Wap
Quote.QuoteValue: I got my own sound; nobody sounds like me

Quote.Author: Fetty Wap
Quote.QuoteValue: Once I come up with the concept, the rest of the song just comes

Quote.Author: Finley Peter Dunne
Quote.QuoteValue: The past always looks better than it was. It's only pleasant because it isn't here

Quote.Author: Finley Peter Dunne
Quote.QuoteValue: Comfort the afflicted, and afflict the comfortable

Quote.Author: Finley Peter Dunne
Quote.QuoteValue: Most vegetarians look so much like the food they eat that they can be classified as cannibals

Quote.Author: Finley Peter Dunne
Quote.QuoteValue: The only good husbands stay bachelors: They're too considerate to get married

Quote.Author: Finley Peter Dunne
Quote.QuoteValue: Trust everybody, but cut the cards

Quote.Author: Finley Peter Dunne
Quote.QuoteValue: It don't make much difference what you study, so long as you don't like it

Quote.Author: Finley Peter Dunne
Quote.QuoteValue: A fanatic is a man that does what he thinks the Lord would do if He knew the facts of the case

Quote.Author: Finley Peter Dunne
Quote.QuoteValue: A lie with a purpose is one of the worst kind, and the most profitable

Quote.Author: Finley Peter Dunne
Quote.QuoteValue: The world is not growing worse and it is not growing better - it is just turning around as usual

Quote.Author: Finley Peter Dunne
Quote.QuoteValue: There are no friends at cards or world politics

Quote.Author: Fiona Apple
Quote.QuoteValue: If you want to see me cry, just come to a photo shoot

Quote.Author: Fiona Apple
Quote.QuoteValue: I used to get a shiver if I thought about holding balloons, because I was scared of floating away

Quote.Author: Fiona Apple
Quote.QuoteValue: The way I feel about music is that there is no right and wrong. Only true and false

Quote.Author: Fiona Apple
Quote.QuoteValue: I was so self-critical. I still am, but it's not as bad anymore

Quote.Author: Fiona Apple
Quote.QuoteValue: I would really like to go back to school. I would love it now

Quote.Author: Fiona Apple
Quote.QuoteValue: If I respect myself and believe in what I'm doing, no one can touch me

Quote.Author: Fiona Apple
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing that you do will ever feel good if you let people convince you that you have no choice

Quote.Author: Fiona Apple
Quote.QuoteValue: There aren't many poster children for cool angst. Everybody thinks it's cool if you're the bad girl

Quote.Author: Fiona Apple
Quote.QuoteValue: Our ancestors always thought of the worst thing that could happen, and that's why we're alive

Quote.Author: Fiona Apple
Quote.QuoteValue: Five years from now I'm probably going to look back on the things I'm doing and cringe

Quote.Author: Fiona Shaw
Quote.QuoteValue: So I just play the character, I play the lines

Quote.Author: Fiona Shaw
Quote.QuoteValue: Even when they have nothing, the Irish emit a kind of happiness, a joy

Quote.Author: Fiona Shaw
Quote.QuoteValue: I certainly had no intention of playing a man

Quote.Author: Fiona Shaw
Quote.QuoteValue: Once you've done one style, you leave it for a while

Quote.Author: Fiona Shaw
Quote.QuoteValue: Theater dates very quickly

Quote.Author: Fiona Shaw
Quote.QuoteValue: Every generation is obsessed with the decade before they were born

Quote.Author: Fiona Shaw
Quote.QuoteValue: The word democracy has no meaning. Duty has gone. Only rights remain

Quote.Author: Fiona Shaw
Quote.QuoteValue: This whole tribal loyalty seems to have gone

Quote.Author: Fiona Shaw
Quote.QuoteValue: There was no professional theater in Cork, but still I did a lot of performing

Quote.Author: Fiona Shaw
Quote.QuoteValue: A lot of Irish people perform. They perform in drawing rooms. They sing songs and they play piano

Quote.Author: Flannery O'Connor
Quote.QuoteValue: The basis of art is truth, both in matter and in mode

Quote.Author: Flannery O'Connor
Quote.QuoteValue: It is better to be young in your failures than old in your successes

Quote.Author: Flannery O'Connor
Quote.QuoteValue: The Southerner is usually tolerant of those weaknesses that proceed from innocence

Quote.Author: Flannery O'Connor
Quote.QuoteValue: I do not know You, God, because I am in the way. Please help me to push myself aside

Quote.Author: Flannery O'Connor
Quote.QuoteValue: The writer should never be ashamed of staring. There is nothing that does not require his attention

Quote.Author: Flannery O'Connor
Quote.QuoteValue: The truth does not change according to our ability to stomach it

Quote.Author: Flannery O'Connor
Quote.QuoteValue: I am not afraid that the book will be controversial, I'm afraid it will not be controversial

Quote.Author: Flannery O'Connor
Quote.QuoteValue: There's many a bestseller that could have been prevented by a good teacher

Quote.Author: Flannery O'Connor
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't deserve any credit for turning the other cheek as my tongue is always in it

Quote.Author: Flannery O'Connor
Quote.QuoteValue: Conviction without experience makes for harshness

Quote.Author: Flavor Flav
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm trying to grow. I don't want to stay on the same page

Quote.Author: Flavor Flav
Quote.QuoteValue: I got a lot happening, a whole lot, and it's not always easy being me

Quote.Author: Flavor Flav
Quote.QuoteValue: If anyone wants to know what the definition of 'dope' means, it's: 'Definition of Public Enemy.'

Quote.Author: Flavor Flav
Quote.QuoteValue: One thing you can't do with babies, you can't give them steak

Quote.Author: Flavor Flav
Quote.QuoteValue: I'll tell you one thing you can't do: you can't put your shoes on, then your socks on

Quote.Author: Flavor Flav
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a real big celebrity. I'm this megastar

Quote.Author: Flavor Flav
Quote.QuoteValue: Your man Flavor Flav is living!

Quote.Author: Flavor Flav
Quote.QuoteValue: My chicken ain't no joke. I ain't scared to go up against the Colonel, tastewise

Quote.Author: Flavor Flav
Quote.QuoteValue: I got my degree in culinary arts in 1978

Quote.Author: Flavor Flav
Quote.QuoteValue: My parents owned a soul food diner. It inspired me to go to culinary school

Quote.Author: Flea
Quote.QuoteValue: Ethiopia is such a great country, beautiful place

Quote.Author: Flea
Quote.QuoteValue: I got my love of jazz from my stepfather, who was a jazz musician

Quote.Author: Flea
Quote.QuoteValue: I studied chord theory and started playing the piano

Quote.Author: Flea
Quote.QuoteValue: We were these arty punks from Hollywood. I considered myself an intellectual

Quote.Author: Flea
Quote.QuoteValue: I love my life and my mistakes and my triumphs - all of it

Quote.Author: Flea
Quote.QuoteValue: I exercise; I have a big career. I'm a parent, and I run a music school

Quote.Author: Flea
Quote.QuoteValue: Bands develop their own weird ways of doing things

Quote.Author: Flea
Quote.QuoteValue: Anything worth doing good takes a little chaos

Quote.Author: Flea
Quote.QuoteValue: Being a rock star isn't all it's cracked up to be, let me tell you

Quote.Author: Flea
Quote.QuoteValue: Kids deserve arts, and it's just as important as science, math, history, English or athletics

Quote.Author: Fleur East
Quote.QuoteValue: I feel like I'm quite versatile. I want to do lots of different styles

Quote.Author: Fleur East
Quote.QuoteValue: Traditionally with debut albums, labels insist on a face, so people know who you are

Quote.Author: Fleur East
Quote.QuoteValue: I hated my big hair. I always wore it straight

Quote.Author: Fleur East
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd done an EP, and nothing came from that, and I didn't know where to go from there

Quote.Author: Fleur East
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a believer in things happening for a reason

Quote.Author: Fleur East
Quote.QuoteValue: Even before I auditioned for 'X Factor' the second time, I was doing a lot of dance music

Quote.Author: Fleur East
Quote.QuoteValue: I used to just sit in the living room and make up songs on the keyboard

Quote.Author: Fleur East
Quote.QuoteValue: Before going on 'X Factor' again, I felt like I'd tried everything else

Quote.Author: Fleur East
Quote.QuoteValue: I've worked in a call centre and as a nightclub waitress. I served champagne to Rihanna

Quote.Author: Fleur East
Quote.QuoteValue: I would never totally deny myself any specific type of food

Quote.Author: Flip Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: When you're hot, you're hot; when you're not, you're not

Quote.Author: Flip Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't expect to hit the jackpot if you don't put a few nickels in the machine

Quote.Author: Flip Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: The devil made me do it

Quote.Author: Flip Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: Funny is an attitude

Quote.Author: Flip Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: Violence is a tool of the ignorant

Quote.Author: Flip Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: The cost of living is going up and the chance of living is going down

Quote.Author: Flip Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: Get well cards have become so humorous that if you don't get sick you're missing half the fun

Quote.Author: Flip Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't order one for the road, because the road is already laid out

Quote.Author: Flip Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: It's later than it's ever been

Quote.Author: Flip Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: I think Mr. Wilson will have to be the rest of the way alone

Quote.Author: Florence Welch
Quote.QuoteValue: The sense of jubilee for music and what we're making is always genuine

Quote.Author: Florence Welch
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a choir girl gone horribly, desperately wrong

Quote.Author: Florence Welch
Quote.QuoteValue: On stage, you can use your emotions. It's the place where you can channel them. They have a purpose

Quote.Author: Florence Welch
Quote.QuoteValue: My style of playing is more enthusiasm and instinct than skill

Quote.Author: Florence Welch
Quote.QuoteValue: You should have high expectations for yourself and others should come second

Quote.Author: Florence Welch
Quote.QuoteValue: My mum wanted me to go to university

Quote.Author: Florence Welch
Quote.QuoteValue: I like the idea of taking off like a bird

Quote.Author: Florence Welch
Quote.QuoteValue: I definitely have a real self-destructive streak

Quote.Author: Florence Welch
Quote.QuoteValue: I feel things in quite an intense way. I'm not actually the most intense person

Quote.Author: Florence Welch
Quote.QuoteValue: I've just never been a tracksuit-wearer

Quote.Author: Flume
Quote.QuoteValue: I think Sydney has so much natural beauty; it's just a beautiful city

Quote.Author: Flume
Quote.QuoteValue: I was an avid Pokemon card collector

Quote.Author: Flume
Quote.QuoteValue: For me, one of the downfalls of electronic music is that it can feel a little soulless or robotic

Quote.Author: Flume
Quote.QuoteValue: The music I was making for people not to dance to was the one they were dancing to

Quote.Author: Flume
Quote.QuoteValue: Imperfection is perfection

Quote.Author: Flume
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to fuse the abrasive and the beautiful

Quote.Author: Flume
Quote.QuoteValue: When I heard Flying Lotus, I was like, 'Wow, okay, everything can be off the grid.'

Quote.Author: Flume
Quote.QuoteValue: 'Sleepless' was the first thing that came out and really gained a lot of traction online

Quote.Author: Flume
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a really heavy sleeper. When I wake up I'm a terrible morning person

Quote.Author: Flume
Quote.QuoteValue: A lot of electronic music out there feels cold. I want to incorporate a human element

Quote.Author: Forest Whitaker
Quote.QuoteValue: Stereotypes do exist, but we have to walk through them

Quote.Author: Forest Whitaker
Quote.QuoteValue: I always stand up for what I believe and what I want to

Quote.Author: Forest Whitaker
Quote.QuoteValue: It's abhorrent to me that somebody is just evil, and you can't explain it

Quote.Author: Forest Whitaker
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm always surprised when an actor goes so deeply into the truth that they shake you to your core

Quote.Author: Forest Whitaker
Quote.QuoteValue: I liked 'Star Wars' as a kid. I liked science fiction

Quote.Author: Forest Whitaker
Quote.QuoteValue: I can't say I follow it, but I've watched 'Downton Abbey' a couple of times and loved it

Quote.Author: Forest Whitaker
Quote.QuoteValue: If there is inequality, and that equates with colour, then I'm going to deal with it

Quote.Author: Forest Whitaker
Quote.QuoteValue: May we remain connected in love. We are one

Quote.Author: Forest Whitaker
Quote.QuoteValue: Good science fiction is always based in contemporary truths

Quote.Author: Forest Whitaker
Quote.QuoteValue: College football, acting, opera singing - I approached them all in the same obsessive way

Quote.Author: Foster Friess
Quote.QuoteValue: People asked, 'So what are you - a multimillionaire?' I like to say, 'A billionaire wanna-be.'

Quote.Author: Foster Friess
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't want to put all your lead on the target. You want to leave some arrows in the quiver

Quote.Author: Foster Friess
Quote.QuoteValue: I think we should be encouraged to learn from Columbine and let it be a battle cry for all of us

Quote.Author: Foster Friess
Quote.QuoteValue: Success should stem from entrepreneurial creativity, not political connectivity

Quote.Author: Foster Friess
Quote.QuoteValue: All of us grow

Quote.Author: Foster Friess
Quote.QuoteValue: If we don't change our culture, the politics is going to migrate more and more to statism

Quote.Author: Foster Friess
Quote.QuoteValue: It's so sad to see how few people in the Obama administration have any private sector experience

Quote.Author: Foster Friess
Quote.QuoteValue: On the national security front, Rick Santorum is superior to any candidate I know

Quote.Author: Foster Friess
Quote.QuoteValue: I have four kids. They are two years apart, and contraception has been very, very good to me

Quote.Author: Foster Friess
Quote.QuoteValue: Rick Santorum has so much potential and so much eagerness to serve our country

Quote.Author: Foxy Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: My purpose is far greater than my pain

Quote.Author: Foxy Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: I was falsely arrested twice, slandered and defamed

Quote.Author: Foxy Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: Put out great music, and that's that

Quote.Author: Foxy Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: To find a prince, you gotta kiss some toads

Quote.Author: Foxy Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: It feels so good to tell the truth

Quote.Author: Foxy Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: I did almost a year in prison, a year in prison, just because my name is Foxy Brown

Quote.Author: Foxy Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not at every party; I'm not seen everywhere. That's why people still care about my brand

Quote.Author: Foxy Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: The only crime I'm guilty of is being a young black woman

Quote.Author: Foxy Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: My life needed to be saved. Not just Foxy. That's my character. That's my work. Inga is a person

Quote.Author: Foxy Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: I am racing to the studio the moment that God affords me the opportunity to hear again

Quote.Author: Fran Drescher
Quote.QuoteValue: Once you wake up and smell the coffee, it's hard to go back to sleep

Quote.Author: Fran Drescher
Quote.QuoteValue: I've gone very far, far away, but my character keeps me close to home

Quote.Author: Fran Drescher
Quote.QuoteValue: Well, my favorite color I guess I would say yellow

Quote.Author: Fran Drescher
Quote.QuoteValue: Since my illness, I've felt the presence of my angels

Quote.Author: Fran Drescher
Quote.QuoteValue: If I go to a concert or sporting event I usually go in a VIP entrance. And leave the same way

Quote.Author: Fran Drescher
Quote.QuoteValue: And remember, it's also very funny, because side by side with grief lies joy

Quote.Author: Fran Drescher
Quote.QuoteValue: If we don't empower ourselves with knowledge, then we're gonna be led down a garden path

Quote.Author: Fran Drescher
Quote.QuoteValue: I've lived, laughed, lost, and loved again the whole Shakespearian thing

Quote.Author: Fran Drescher
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is precious and there's not a lot of room for anger

Quote.Author: Fran Drescher
Quote.QuoteValue: I had my moments when I got very frightened that I would not recover

Quote.Author: Fran Lebowitz
Quote.QuoteValue: You're only as good as your last haircut

Quote.Author: Fran Lebowitz
Quote.QuoteValue: My favorite animal is steak

Quote.Author: Fran Lebowitz
Quote.QuoteValue: If you are a dog and your owner suggests that you wear a sweater suggest that he wear a tail

Quote.Author: Fran Lebowitz
Quote.QuoteValue: In real life, I assure you, there is no such thing as algebra

Quote.Author: Fran Lebowitz
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is something to do when you can't get to sleep

Quote.Author: Fran Lebowitz
Quote.QuoteValue: I figure you have the same chance of winning the lottery whether you play or not

Quote.Author: Fran Lebowitz
Quote.QuoteValue: Humility is no substitute for a good personality

Quote.Author: Fran Lebowitz
Quote.QuoteValue: If you're going to America, bring your own food

Quote.Author: Fran Lebowitz
Quote.QuoteValue: The opposite of talking isn't listening. The opposite of talking is waiting

Quote.Author: Fran Lebowitz
Quote.QuoteValue: Even when freshly washed and relieved of all obvious confections, children tend to be sticky

Quote.Author: Francesca Annis
Quote.QuoteValue: However successful you are, there is no substitute for a close relationship. We all need them

Quote.Author: Francesca Annis
Quote.QuoteValue: I am not a fanatic about anything. I do what I can do when I've got the time

Quote.Author: Francesca Annis
Quote.QuoteValue: I like having a good time. It's probably my mother's Brazilian genes in me - party, party

Quote.Author: Francesca Annis
Quote.QuoteValue: As you grow older, your whole life becomes very rich, multifaceted

Quote.Author: Francesca Annis
Quote.QuoteValue: Having children with someone is the real bond

Quote.Author: Francesca Annis
Quote.QuoteValue: I didn't choose to be an actress

Quote.Author: Francesca Annis
Quote.QuoteValue: The first thing you have to do is accept that decay sets in and there's nothing you can do about it

Quote.Author: Francesca Annis
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't want three million people digesting my private life over their cornflakes

Quote.Author: Francesca Annis
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't regret the passing of time. I try to live in the present, which should mean my life's full

Quote.Author: Francesca Annis
Quote.QuoteValue: Truly charismatic people, in my experience, don't come along very often

Quote.Author: Francis Chan
Quote.QuoteValue: Even in my own church I heard the words, 'Francis Chan' more than I heard the words, 'Holy Spirit.'

Quote.Author: Francis Chan
Quote.QuoteValue: I want the joy of knowing that I am doing something with my life, the joy of battle

Quote.Author: Francis Chan
Quote.QuoteValue: If you really want to experience God, go and make disciples

Quote.Author: Francis Chan
Quote.QuoteValue: I could be wrong about salvation. I could be wrong about a lot of things

Quote.Author: Francis Chan
Quote.QuoteValue: Every year in my life, I trust fewer and fewer people

Quote.Author: Francis Chan
Quote.QuoteValue: When I don't think biblically, I go nuts. I just go, 'This is crazy.'

Quote.Author: Francis Chan
Quote.QuoteValue: I've never felt a need to really respond to someone else's writing

Quote.Author: Francis Chan
Quote.QuoteValue: There are just certain times I sense the Lord is wanting me to write, and so I write

Quote.Author: Francis Chan
Quote.QuoteValue: If I have a script, I tend to stick to it even if God may be leading me elsewhere in the moment

Quote.Author: Francis Chan
Quote.QuoteValue: With my natural communication abilities, I could probably gather a crowd even without the Spirit

Quote.Author: Francis Ford Coppola
Quote.QuoteValue: Art depends on luck and talent

Quote.Author: Francis Ford Coppola
Quote.QuoteValue: As long as I can make lots of money in other businesses, I'll continue to subsidize my own work

Quote.Author: Francis Ford Coppola
Quote.QuoteValue: Usually, the stuff that's your best idea or work is going to be attacked the most

Quote.Author: Francis Ford Coppola
Quote.QuoteValue: I remember teachers who really singled me out for their discouragement

Quote.Author: Francis Ford Coppola
Quote.QuoteValue: I liked to work in a shop down in the basement and invent things and build gadgets

Quote.Author: Francis Ford Coppola
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think there's any artist of any value who doesn't doubt what they're doing

Quote.Author: Francis Ford Coppola
Quote.QuoteValue: I like simplicity; I don't need luxury

Quote.Author: Francis Ford Coppola
Quote.QuoteValue: It takes no imagination to live within your means

Quote.Author: Francis Ford Coppola
Quote.QuoteValue: Anything you build on a large scale or with intense passion invites chaos

Quote.Author: Francis Ford Coppola
Quote.QuoteValue: We had access to too much money, too much equipment, and little by little, we went insane

Quote.Author: Francis Parker Yockey
Quote.QuoteValue: Alliance does not mean love, any more than war means hate

Quote.Author: Francis Parker Yockey
Quote.QuoteValue: Liberalism is Rationalism in politics

Quote.Author: Francis Parker Yockey
Quote.QuoteValue: Pessimism only describes an attitude, and not facts, and hence is entirely subjective

Quote.Author: Francis Parker Yockey
Quote.QuoteValue: The purest expression of the doctrine of Liberalism was probably that of Benjamin Constant

Quote.Author: Francis Parker Yockey
Quote.QuoteValue: Liberalism can only be defined negatively. It is a mere critique, not a living idea

Quote.Author: Francis Parker Yockey
Quote.QuoteValue: The independence of the economic sphere was a tenet of faith with Liberalism

Quote.Author: Francis Parker Yockey
Quote.QuoteValue: Politics is activity in relation to power

Quote.Author: Francis Parker Yockey
Quote.QuoteValue: The way politics divides the world is into friend and enemy
